input.sentences: the guy was excited to finish
output.sentences: The sound of shoes hitting the pavement responded to their cheers as the racers finished, out of breath.
A guy wheezing, completely winded, made it past the finish line excited and prideful.
People gulped down breaths of air slowing their heart rate.
Hours later, the racers went out to celebrate and to eat all the calories they burned off on their run.
